about.name: Nathalie Rautell
about.description: You either find me typing on a keyboard or at the gym somewhere between the weights. So basically I'm always building something, if not websites and applications then physical strength.

skills.skillmessage: A short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

featured.title: Movie app
featured.description: Multi-page React.js application showing data from themoviedb.org's API. The shown data is fetched from different API urls, the chosen url is based on to the user interaction

featured.title: RSVP app
featured.description: Multi-step form built with React.js for RSVP where each question is shown in its own section and a progress bar is shown.

featured.title: Happy thoughts app
featured.description: React.js application used for fetching and posting data to an API. Used to post and like short messages.
